Text:
Super Dinosaur is really popular with kids and those who like dinosaurs.  I read the first four issues and it wasn't really appealing to me, but I'm going to revisit the series this weekend.

Here's a good review:
http://blog.schoollibraryjournal.com/goodcomicsforkids/2012/06/06/review-super-dinosaur-vol-1/
I love Kirkman, especially invincible, this just seems a little too young - let me know after your re-read
